snippet: A conservative advocacy group backed by the billionaire Koch brothers said Thursday it will spend $2.5 million on television advertisements targeting three vulnerable Democratic senators.
abstract: A conservative advocacy group backed by the billionaire Koch brothers said Thursday it will spend $2.5 million on television advertisements targeting three vulnerable Democratic senators.

headline.main: New Ad Campaign Criticizes Senators for Support of Health Law

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
